diagram_logic_form: The measure of angle MLP is 31 degrees.
The measure of angle LNM is the same as angle 2.
The measure of angle PNQ is the same as angle 1.
The measure of angle NQP is the same as angle 3.
The measure of angle QPN is 22 degrees.
Point N lies on the line connecting L and P.
Point N also lies on the line connecting M and Q.
The line LM is perpendicular to the line NM.
line_instances: There are lines LM, LN, LP, and PQ.
There are lines MQ, NM, NQ, and PN.
